title: Mozzarella and rocket salad
ingredients: ['1 handful fresh basil leaves', '3 handfuls rocket leaves', '4 tomatoes, sliced', '250g mozzarella cheese, sliced', 'For the dressing', '5 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon prepared mustard', '2 cloves garlic, minced', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
